display.title: Basic Capacitor
display.description:
Essential component for EnderIO machines. Capacitors are used to craft various machines and many machines require capacitors to function.

Ender IO is a full-featured tech mod. It has armor, tools, weapons, machines, conduits, inventory management, mobs, etc.

Ender IO is being rewritten from the ground up for the latest version of Minecraft, as such some features will not yet have been ported.
